metadata.title: CVE-2017-7697 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
In libsamplerate before 0.1.9, a buffer over-read occurs in thecalc_output_single function in src_sinc.c via a crafted audio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsamplerate0 - 0.1.8-8ubuntu0.1~esm1
samplerate-programs - 0.1.8-8ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libsamplerate package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.1.8-8ubuntu0.1~esm1').
